## What does `make_project()` do?  

+ Make a project with a vignette
  + All you need to add is a license file
  
::: {.fragment}
  + And science
:::  
  
## What about other types of package files

+ `write_man()` - write a pretty manual page for a dataset

## What about saving your talks?

+ `write_slides()`
  + save them into the inst folder
+ `find_slides()`
  + shows the names of all decks saved into a package
+ `slideshow()`
  + displays the sides that were saved in package
